Recommendations: Terminate unused stopped instances or create AMIs and delete instances
Review S3 lifecycle policies, enable Intelligent-Tiering, and delete old versions
Review Lambda memory allocation and timeout settings for optimization
Set retention policies on CloudWatch Logs to reduce storage costs
Review and delete old snapshots to reduce storage costs
Findings: Found 3 stopped EC2 instances still incurring EBS costs
Found 82 log groups without retention policies
